# tfff

This is an internal package for [the Ford Family
Foundation](https://tfff.org) to help make data viz, get data, etc.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tfff from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rfortherestofus/tfff")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`download_file()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/tfff/reference/download_file.md)
  : Download a file from a GitHub repository
- [`get_files()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/tfff/reference/get_files.md)
  : Get a list of files matching a pattern from a GitHub repository
- [`load_obtn_data()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/tfff/reference/load_obtn_data.md)
  : Load data from a GitHub repository
- [`register_fonts()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/tfff/reference/register_fonts.md)
  : Function to register fonts of the TFFF
- [`t_col()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/tfff/reference/t_col.md)
  : Transparency color - from
  https://www.dataanalytics.org.uk/make-transparent-colors-in-r/
- [`tfff_colors()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/tfff/reference/tfff_colors.md)
  : Function to extract TFFF colors as hex codes
- [`tfff_draft()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/tfff/reference/tfff_draft.md)
  : TFFF paged template
- [`tfff_get_basemap()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/tfff/reference/tfff_get_basemap.md)
  : Function to get an sf object with the TFFF service area (Oregon and
  Siskiyou County, California)
- [`tfff_offices`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/tfff/reference/tfff_offices.md)
  : Locations of TFFF offices
- [`theme_tfff()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/tfff/reference/theme_tfff.md)
  : TFFF ggplot2 theme
